alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bay; Inland Bay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 1:12PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Bay County through 145 PM EDT/1245 PM CDT/... At 111 PM EDT/1211 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hiland Park, or near Lynn Haven. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Springfield, Hiland Park, Bayhead, Southport, Dirego Park, Recota Beach, College Station, Bayou George, Camp Flowers, Cairo, Brannonville, Vicksburg, Majette and Cedar Grove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
